Items.Name: Passport
Items.Description: Agent is traveling internationally, we've procured a fake passport to hide his tracks.

Items.Name: Lockpicking Kit
Items.Description: Agent had to leave infiltration tools behind. Needs new tools for his next mission.

Items.Name: Tactical Turtleneck
Items.Description: Make sure it's black, he has to be stealthy.

Items.Name: Spicy Chicken Sandwich
Items.Description: Agent has been surviving on field rations for a few weeks and desperately wants some flavor.

MissionDescription:
Agent is traveling internationally, we've procured a fake passport to hide his tracks. He also needs a lockpick and a black turtleneck for an infiltration mission.
He's been persisting on rations for weeks and desperately wants some flavor.
